name: WASHINGTON CONVENTION CENTER AUTHORITY/EVENTSDC
description: Convention and Sports Authority for the District of Columbia
sampleDescriptions: Extend for an additional 50 years the lease under which the District of Columbia government uses the ground under and parking facilities associated with Robert F. Kennedy Memorial Stadium (H.R. 3373).
